actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3489 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Foreign Affairs now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments. Consideration of all amendments to said substitute including all amendments en bloc, shall not exceed five and one-half hours.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-274, by Mr. Hall (OH).
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 66.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3489) to reauthorize the Export Administration Act of 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3489 (foreign trade).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3489) to reauthorize the Export Administration Act of 1979, and for other purposes.
